abstract: This study explores microgravity effects on biological systems in the context of space exploration and human spaceflight. Our research contributes to understanding the biological adaptations necessary for long-duration space missions.

Conclusion: This research advances our knowledge of biological adaptation to space environments and informs countermeasure development.
